example.eg: She deserves a pay rise. She has worked really hard.
example.egtrans: 她应该加工资。她工作真的很努力。

example.eg: He deserves to be yelled at for doing what he did!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 应受, 该受, 活该

example.eg: My daughter is a wonderful woman. Do you really think you deserve her?
example.egtrans: 我女儿非常优秀，你真的觉得自己配的上她吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 值得, 应得, 配得上

example.eg: If you follow the rules and obey all guidelines, you will get what you deserve.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 得到相应回报, 善有善报

example.eg: If you deliberately break the rules and disregard authority, you will get what you deserve.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 恶有恶报, 活该, 得了报应
